maqras.text: Ma 'Ash/hadtuhum Khalqa As-Samawati Wa Al-'Arđi Wa La Khalqa 'Anfusihim Wa Ma Kuntu Muttakhidha Al-Muđillina `Ađudaan
Wa Yawma Yaqulu Nadu Shuraka'iya Al-Ladhina Za`amtum Fada`awhum Falam Yastajibu Lahum Wa Ja`alna Baynahum Mawbiqaan
Wa Ra'a Al-Mujrimuna An-Nara Fazannu 'Annahum Muwaqi`uha Wa Lam Yajidu `Anha Masrifaan
Wa Laqad Sarrafna Fi Hadha Al-Qur'ani Lilnnasi Min Kulli Mathalin Wa Kana Al-'Insanu 'Akthara Shay'in Jadalaan
Wa Ma Mana`a An-Nasa 'An Yu'uminu 'Idh Ja'ahumu Al-Huda Wa Yastaghfiru Rabbahum 'Illa 'An Ta'tiyahum Sunnatu Al-'Awwalina 'Aw Ya'tiyahumu Al-`Adhabu Qubulaan
Wa Ma Nursilu Al-Mursalina 'Illa Mubashirina Wa Mundhirina Wa Yujadilu Al-Ladhina Kafaru Bil-Batili Liyudhiđu Bihi Al-Haqqa Wa Attakhadhu 'Ayati Wa Ma 'Undhiru Huzuan

Wa Man 'Azlamu Mimman Dhukkira Bi'ayati Rabbihi Fa'a`rađa `Anha Wa Nasiya Ma Qaddamat Yadahu 'Inna Ja`alna `Ala Qulubihim 'Akinnatan 'An Yafqahuhu Wa Fi 'Adhanihim Waqraan Wa 'In Tad`uhum 'Ila Al-Huda Falan Yahtadu 'Idhaan 'Abadaan
Wa Rabbuka Al-Ghafuru Dhu Ar-Rahmati Law Yu'uakhidhuhum Bima Kasabu La`ajjala Lahumu Al-`Adhaba Bal Lahum Maw`idun Lan Yajidu Min Dunihi Maw'ilaan
Wa Tilka Al-Qura 'Ahlaknahum Lamma Zalamu Wa Ja`alna Limahlikihim Maw`idaan
Wa 'Idh Qala Musa Lifatahu La 'Abrahu Hatta 'Ablugha Majma`a Al-Bahrayni 'Aw 'Amđiya Huqubaan
Falamma Balagha Majma`a Baynihima Nasiya Hutahuma Fa Attakhadha Sabilahu Fi Al-Bahri Sarabaan
Falamma Jawaza Qala Lifatahu 'Atina Ghada'ana Laqad Laqina Min Safarina Hadha Nasabaan
Qala 'Ara'ayta 'Idh 'Awayna 'Ila As-Sakhrati Fa'inni Nasitu Al-Huta Wa Ma 'Ansanihu 'Illa Ash-Shaytanu 'An 'Adhkurahu Wa Attakhadha Sabilahu Fi Al-Bahri `Ajabaan
Qala Dhalika Ma Kunna Nabghi Fartadda `Ala 'Atharihima Qasasaan
Fawajada `Abdaan Min `Ibadina 'Ataynahu Rahmatan Min `Indina Wa `Allamnahu Min Ladunna `Ilmaan
Qala Lahu Musa Hal 'Attabi`uka `Ala 'An Tu`allimani Mimma `Ullimta Rushdaan
Qala 'Innaka Lan Tastati`a Ma`iya Sabraan
Wa Kayfa Tasbiru `Ala Ma Lam Tuhit Bihi Khubraan
Qala Satajiduni 'In Sha'a Allahu Sabiraan Wa La 'A`si Laka 'Amraan
Qala Fa'ini Attaba`tani Fala Tas'alni `An Shay'in Hatta 'Uhditha Laka Minhu Dhikraan
Fantalaqa Hatta 'Idha Rakiba Fi As-Safinati Kharaqaha Qala 'Akharaqtaha Litughriqa 'Ahlaha Laqad Ji'ta Shay'aan 'Imraan
Qala 'Alam 'Aqul 'Innaka Lan Tastati`a Ma`iya Sabraan
Qala La Tu'uakhidhni Bima Nasitu Wa La Turhiqni Min 'Amri `Usraan
Fantalaqa Hatta 'Idha Laqiya Ghulamaan Faqatalahu Qala 'Aqatalta Nafsaan Zakiyatan Bighayri Nafsin Laqad Ji'ta Shay'aan Nukraan
